mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content (price, title, image, summary, detail) VALUES (#{price},#{title},#{image},#{summary},#{detail})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.price,c.title, c.image, c.summary , c.detail FROM content c
SELECT c.id, c.price,c.title, c.image, c.summary , c.detail FROM content c WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE content AS c SET c.price = #{price},c.title = #{title} , c.image = #{image}, c.summary = #{summary} , c.detail = #{detail} WHERE id = #{id}
